narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Utmb Faculty Group Practice is a Anesthesiology provider based in Galveston, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $98.7M in Medicaid payments across 2.2M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $98.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
